  • Class
    Description
    Armor
    Represents an armor item which increases the players armour statistics, and hence overall reduces the damage taken by the player.
    Bandage
    The bandage item class that can be used by player to increase health, by a small health boost of 20.
    BuffItem
    A class that represents an item that cannot be added to the inventory, and instead applies effects immediately upon pickup

    An item that can be collected.

    EnergyDrink
    An energy drink item that immediately affects the player's speed upon pickup.
